name: Arctic Fox (itch)
description:
A fox embarks on an adventure to Save Christmas(tm)!

The fox wants to recover Santa's gifts and her own homemade gift - there's just one problem, the fox needs paths to get around (as all foxes do), and there are none to be seen! Build paths to help the fox collect the gifts and get to her destination
